comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Could be William Edward "Wild Bill" Donovan (1876-1923), a baseball player and manager of the NY Yankees, 1915-17. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Donovan

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: pennylrichardsca, I think you are correct. He looks the same as the man Bain identified as Bill Donovan in www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2005018251/ and www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2005018250/. We will update with his full name.
